01 02 03 04 05 
06 07 08 09 10 
11 12 13 14 15



01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 09 10 11 12 13 14 15


column 0 -> 0, 5, 10 
column 1 -> 1, 6, 11


i - column % with  == 0

inicial W:3 H:5
01 02 03
04 05 06
07 08 09
10 11 12
13 14 15

01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 09 10 11 12 13 14 15

01 04 07 10 13 
02 05 08 11 14 
03 06 09 12 15

01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 09 10 11 12 13 14 15

row 0 (01 02 03) -> 0, 5, 10 
row 1 (02 07 12) -> 1, 6, 11

row H -1  (05 10, 15) -> 4, 9, 14

..#........#
